confirm_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete user {username}?
analysis_error: Failed to analyze the file. Please try again.
auth_error: No authorization token found. Please log in.
title: Privacy Policy
admin: The data controller is the owner of the application. Contact details are provided below.
scope: The application collects and stores only the data necessary for login: username and password (encrypted).
purpose: Personal data is used solely to enable the user to log into the application.
legal: The legal basis for data processing is the legitimate interest of the controller – ensuring functionality and security.
sharing: Data is not shared with third parties, except as required by law.
rights: Users have the right to access, correct, delete, and restrict the processing of their data.
security: Passwords are stored in encrypted form using secure mechanisms..
cookies: The application does not use tracking mechanisms.
contact: For data-related matters, contact us at: tadeusz@kielak.com
general: Braggly is a web application for analyzing data from UXD files. The application is provided by the owner of the kielak.com domain.
storage: Upon user request, UXD files may be temporarily stored on the server for later or more in-depth analysis. Users may request deletion of their files at any time.
liability: Every effort has been made to ensure the application functions correctly. However, the owner of Braggly is not liable for any consequences of using the application, including incorrect analysis results or data loss.
payments: Braggly is currently free to use. In the future, some features may require payment. Users will be informed in advance of any such changes.
changes: The Terms of Service may change over time. The most recent version will always be available at this URL.
terms_contact: For questions related to Braggly or data, please contact: tadeusz@kielak.com
app_purpose_title: Discover the Power of XRD Analysis
app_purpose_description: Braggly is a cutting-edge platform for X-ray Diffraction (XRD) analysis. Upload your XRD files, analyze them with advanced tools, and explore a library of publicly shared XRD data from the community.
restricted_paths_header: List of paths with paid access
what_are_tokens_for: To access certain features of the system, you need to have a positive token balance. Tokens are consumed at a rate of 1 token per day. In other words, if you have 30 tokens, you will be able to use all system features for 30 days. To purchase tokens, use the form below.
donations: Currently, all system features are available free of charge. However, if you would like to support the development of the application, you can purchase a number of tokens. After the free access period ends, these tokens will allow you to continue using the full functionality of the system. To purchase tokens, use the form below.
confirm_make_private: Are you sure you want to remove this file from the public list?
comparison_min_files: Select at least two files for comparison analysis
